text: Mohamed Abdelaziz (; 17 August 1947 - 31 May 2016) was the 3rd Secretary General of the Polisario Front and President of the Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic from 1976 until his death in 2016. Abdelaziz died on 31 May 2016 from lung cancer, aged 68.Mort du chef du Polisario Mohamed Abdelaziz ==References== ==Other websites== * Mohamed Abdelaziz: Carta abierta al rey de Marruecos (1999) * President of the SADR photo gallery Category:1947 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Presidents (government) Category:Socialists Category:People from Marrakesh
title: Mohamed Abdelaziz
